name: Doran's Shield
simpleDescription: Good defensive starting item

passives.name: Enduring Focus
passives.effects: After taking damage from a [[champion]] or large [[monster]], gain [[health regeneration]] equal to {{pp|0 to 45 for 11|type='''current missing''' health|color=health|key1=%|0 to 75|formula=0.6 health regen for every 1% missing health}} health over 8 seconds. Reduced to{{ft|66% effectiveness|{{pp|0 to 45*0.66 for 11|type='''current missing''' health|color=health|key1=%|0 to 75|formula=0.396 health regen for every 1% missing health}}}} if owned by {{tip|ranged}} champions or when triggered by [[area of effect]], [[damage over time]], or [[damage|proc]].

name: Doran's Blade
simpleDescription: Good starting item for attackers

name: Doran's Ring
simpleDescription: Good starting item for casters

passives.name: Restoration
passives.effects: Restore {{as|{{fd|1.25}} mana}} every second. If you cannot gain mana, {{tip|healing|heal}}{{ft|45% of this value|{{fd|{{#expr:0.45*1.25}}}}}}instead.

name: Dark Seal
simpleDescription: Provides Ability Power and Mana.  Increases in power as you kill enemies.

passives.name: Glory
passives.effects: Gain 2 stacks for each champion [[kill]] and 1 stack for each [[assist]], up to a '''maximum''' of 10 stacks. For every stack, gain {{as|4 ability power}}, up to {{as|40|AP}} at '''maximum''' stacks. Lose 5 stacks on [[death]]. Stacks are preserved when upgrading to {{ii|Mejai's Soulstealer}}.

name: Cull
simpleDescription: Provides damage and Life Steal on hit - Killing minions grant bonus Gold

passives.name: Reap
passives.effects: Killing a [[minion]] grants an additional {{g|1}}, up to a '''maximum''' of {{g|100}}.
After your pet reaches its final evolution, consumes this item to grant you the {{bi|Gustwalker}} buff.
Reduces all incoming damage by 50%. This item disappears after 5 minutes.
While no enemy {{tip|minions}} or {{ui|Rift Herald|Summoned Rift Herald}} are within range, gain 80% damage reduction, including {{as|true damage}}.
Base turrets have health regeneration, but cannot regenerate past their current segment. They are segmented at {{as|33%|health}}, {{as|66%|health}} and {{as|100% health}}.

{{tip|Turret}} basic attacks are modified to deal {{as|{{pp|key=%|14;11;8|Outer;Inner;Inhibitor/Nexus|type=turret type}} of this minion's '''maximum''' health}} as {{tt|pre-mitigation damage|Damage calculated before modifiers}}.
{{tip|Turret}} basic attacks are modified to deal {{as|45% of this minion's '''maximum''' health}} as {{tt|pre-mitigation damage|Damage calculated before modifiers}}.

name: Health Potion
simpleDescription: Consume to restore Health over time

name: Corrupting Potion
simpleDescription: Restores Health and Mana over time and boosts combat power - Refills at Shop

passives.effects: Holds charges that refill upon visiting the [[shop]].

name: Guardian's Amulet
simpleDescription: Increases Health and provides Stealth Wards over time

passives.name: Recovery
passives.effects: Restore {{as|10 mana}} every 5 seconds. Manaless champions restore {{as|3 health}} instead.

name: Guardian's Horn
simpleDescription: Good starting item for tanks

passives.name: Undaunted
passives.effects: Reduces all sources of incoming champion damage by 15 ''({{fd|3.75}} against [[damage over time]] abilities)''.

passives.name: Legendary
passives.effects: This item counts as a Legendary item.

name: Control Ward
simpleDescription: Used to disable wards and invisible traps in an area.

name: Elixir of Iron
simpleDescription: Temporarily increases defenses. Leaves a trail for allies to follow.

name: Elixir of Sorcery
simpleDescription: Temporarily grants Ability Power and Bonus Damage to champions and turrets.

name: Elixir of Wrath
simpleDescription: Temporarily grants Attack Damage and heals you when dealing physical damage to champions.

name: Shattered Armguard
simpleDescription: Upgrades to stopwatch

name: Archangel's Staff
simpleDescription: Increases Ability Power based on maximum Mana

passives.name: Awe
passives.effects: Grants {{as|ability power}} equal to {{as|1% '''bonus''' mana}}.

passives.name: Manaflow
passives.effects: Grants a charge every 8 seconds, up to 5 charges. Affecting an enemy or ally with an [[champion ability|ability]] consumes a charge to grant {{as|5 '''bonus''' mana}}, increased to {{as|10|mana}} if they are a champion, up to a '''maximum''' of {{as|360 '''bonus''' mana}}.
Transforms into {{ii|Seraph's Embrace}} at {{as|360 '''bonus''' mana}}.

name: Atma's Reckoning
simpleDescription: Increases Attack Damage based on maximum Health

passives.name: Big Hands
passives.effects: Gain {{as|{{pp|key=%|type='''bonus''' health|0 to 30 for 11|0 to 3000|formula=1% per 100 bonus health}}|critical strike chance}} {{as|critical strike chance}}.

name: Berserker's Greaves
simpleDescription: Enhances Move Speed and Attack Speed

name: Boots of Swiftness
simpleDescription: Enhances Move Speed and reduces the effect of slows

passives.name: Puffcap Toxin
passives.effects: Dealing damage to enemy champions inflicts them with {{tip|Grievous Wounds}} for 3 seconds. If the target is afflicted with {{tip|Grievous Wounds}} and heals for a total amount that is over {{as|80% of their '''maximum''' health}}, the strength of the healing reduction is increased to 60%.

name: Glacial Buckler
simpleDescription: Increases Armor and Cooldown Reduction

name: Guardian Angel
simpleDescription: Periodically revives champion upon death

passives.name: Rebirth
passives.effects: Upon taking [[death|lethal damage]], enter {{tip|resurrection}} for 4 seconds, during which you are {{tip|invulnerable}}, {{tip|untargetable}}, and unable to act, and afterwards {{tip|heal}} for {{as|50% of '''base''' health}} and restore {{as|100% of '''maximum''' mana}}.

name: Infinity Edge
simpleDescription: Massively enhances critical strikes

name: Black Cleaver
simpleDescription: Dealing physical damage to enemy champions reduces their Armor

passives.name: Carve
passives.effects: Dealing {{as|physical damage}} to an enemy champion applies a stack of ''Carve'' for 6 seconds, stacking up to 5 times. Each stack inflicts {{as|5% armor reduction}}, up to {{as|25%|armor}} at 5 stacks.

passives.name: Fervor
passives.effects: Dealing {{as|physical damage}} grants you {{as|20 '''bonus''' movement speed}} for 2 seconds.

name: Bloodthirster
simpleDescription: Grants Attack Damage, Life Steal and Life Steal now overheals

passives.name: Engorge
passives.effects: While above {{as|70% '''maximum''' health}}, gain {{as|{{pp|10;15 to 40 for 6|1;13 to 18}} '''bonus''' attack damage}}.

name: Experimental Hexplate
simpleDescription: Increases maximum Mana as Mana is spent

passives.name: Hexcharged
passives.effects: Gain 30 [[Haste#Ultimate haste|ultimate haste]].

passives.name: Overdrive
passives.effects: Upon casting your ultimate ability, enter ''Overdrive'' to gain {{as|30% '''bonus''' attack speed}} and {{as|15% '''bonus''' movement speed}} for 8 seconds.

passives.name: Thorns
passives.effects: When struck by a basic attack [[on-hit]], deal {{as|6 magic damage}} to the attacker and, if they are a champion, inflict them with {{tip|Grievous Wounds}} for 3 seconds.

name: Heartsteel
simpleDescription: Restores Health on kill or assist

passives.name: Colossal Consumption
passives.effects: While within 700 units of an enemy champion, generate a stack on them each second, stacking up to 3 times. Your next basic attack against a target with 3 stacks is empowered to consume them all to deal {{as|80|physical damage}} {{as|(+ 12% '''bonus''' health '''from items''')}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} [[on-hit]] and grant you permanent {{as|'''bonus''' health}} equal to{{ft|12% of that amount|{{as|{{ap|80*0.12}} (+ {{ap|12*0.12}}% '''bonus''' health '''from items''')}}}}

passives.name: Goliath
passives.effects: Gain {{as|{{pp|key=%|0 to 30 for 11|0 to 10000|type='''maximum''' health}}|hp}} increased size.

name: Banshee's Veil
simpleDescription: Periodically blocks enemy abilities

passives.name: Annul
passives.effects: Grants a {{tip|spell shield}} that blocks the next hostile ability.

name: Fiendish Codex
simpleDescription: Increases Ability Power and Cooldown Reduction

name: Frozen Heart
simpleDescription: Massively increases Armor and slows enemy basic attacks

passives.name: Rock Solid
passives.effects: Every first incoming instance of {{tt|post-mitigation|Damage calculated after modifiers}} {{tip|basic damage}} per {{tip|cast instance}} is [[Damage modifier|reduced]] by 5 {{as|(+ {{fd|3.5}} per 1000 '''maximum''' health)}}, '''maximum''' 20% reduction each.

passives.name: Winter's Caress
passives.effects: {{tip|Cripple|Cripples}} the [[attack speed]] of enemies within {{tt|700 units|center to edge}} by 20%.

name: Guardian's Orb
simpleDescription: Good starting item for mages

passives.name: Recovery
passives.effects: Restore {{as|10 mana}} every 5 seconds. Manaless champions restore {{as|15 health}} instead.

name: Forbidden Idol

passives.name: Awe
passives.effects: Grants {{as|'''bonus''' health}} equal to {{as|8% '''maximum''' mana}}.

passives.name: Everlasting
passives.effects: {{tip|immobilize|Immobilizing}}, or {{tip|slow|slowing}} if you are {{tip|melee}}, an enemy champion grants a {{pp|100 to 180}} {{as|(+ {{fd|4.5}}% '''current''' mana)}} {{tip|shield}} for 3 seconds (8 second cooldown). The shield's strength is increased{{ft|by 80%|to {{pp|100*1.8 to 200*1.8}} {{as|(+ {{ap|5*1.8}}% '''current''' mana)}}}}if there is more than one enemy champion within {{tip|cr|icononly=true}} 1200 units.

name: Executioner's Calling
simpleDescription: Overcomes enemies with high health gain

passives.name: Grievous Wounds
passives.effects: Dealing {{as|physical damage}} to enemy champions inflicts them with {{tip|Grievous Wounds}} for 3 seconds.

passives.name: Wrath
passives.effects: Basic attacks deal {{as|30 '''bonus''' magic damage}} on-hit.

passives.name: Seething Strike
passives.effects: Basic attacks grant {{as|8% '''bonus''' attack speed}} for 3 seconds, stacking up to 4 times for a total of {{as|32% '''bonus''' attack speed}}. At maximum stacks, basic attacks on-attack also grant a ''Phantom'' stack for 6 seconds, up to 2 stacks. At 2 ''Phantom'' stacks, the next basic attack consumes all of those stacks on-attack to trigger a ''Phantom Hit'' that applies {{tip|on-hit}} effects to the target at 100% effectiveness after a {{fd|0.15}} second delay.

name: Caulfield's Warhammer
simpleDescription: Attack Damage and Cooldown Reduction

name: Cryptbloom
simpleDescription: Activate to remove all debuffs and grant massive Move Speed

passives.name: Life From Death
passives.effects: Scoring a {{tip|takedown}} against an enemy champion while alive and within 3 seconds of damaging them summons a nova that radiates from the location of their death over {{fd|1.75}} seconds, {{tip|heal|healing}} you and allied champions hit for 50 {{as|(+ 50% AP)}}.

name: Hextech Alternator
simpleDescription: Increases Ability Power. Deal bonus magic damage on attack periodically.

passives.name: Revved
passives.effects: Damaging an enemy champion deals {{as|65 '''bonus''' magic damage}}.

name: Hextech Gunblade
simpleDescription: Increases Attack Damage and Ability Power, activate to slow a target

active.name: Lightning Bolt
active.effects: Shocks the target enemy champion, dealing {{as|{{pp|175 to 253}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 30% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}} {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 40% for 2 seconds.

name: Haunting Guise
simpleDescription: Deals additional physical damage when ambushing enemies

passives.name: Madness
passives.effects: For each second in combat with enemy champions, deal 2% increased damage, stacking up to 3 times for a total of 6%.

name: Hextech Rocketbelt
simpleDescription: Activate to dash forward and unleash a fiery explosion

active.name: Supersonic
active.effects: {{tip|Dash}} 125 to 275 units in the target direction, though not through terrain, unleashing an arc of 7 rockets in the same direction that deal {{as|100 {{as|(+ 10% AP)}} magic damage|magic damage}} to enemies hit.

name: Blade of the Ruined King
simpleDescription: Deals damage based on target's Health, can steal Move Speed

passives.name: Mist's Edge
passives.effects: Basic attacks deal {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} [[on-hit]] equal to {{as|{{rd|12%|9%}} of the target's '''current''' health}}, with a '''minimum''' of 15 against all units and a '''maximum''' of 60 against minions and monsters.

passives.name: Clawing Shadows
passives.effects: Your next basic attack [[on-hit]] against an enemy champion is empowered to {{tip|slow}} them by {{rd|30%|15%}} for 1 second.

name: Hexdrinker
simpleDescription: Increases Attack Damage and Magic Resist

passives.name: Lifeline
passives.effects: If you would take {{as|magic damage}} that would reduce you below {{as|30% of your '''maximum''' health}}, you first gain a {{tip|shield}} that absorbs {{as|{{rd|110 to 280|82.5 to 210|pp=true}} magic damage}} for {{fd|2.5}} seconds.

name: Ionian Boots of Lucidity
simpleDescription: Increases Move Speed and Cooldown Reduction

name: Guardian's Blade
simpleDescription: Good starting item for attackers

passives.name: Legendary
passives.effects: This item counts as a Legendary item.

passives.name: Skipper
passives.effects: Basic attacks [[on-hit]] against any enemy grant a stack for 10 seconds, stacking up to 5 times. At '''maximum''' stacks, or 4 stacks, your next basic attack against a champion, epic monster, or structure consumes all stacks to deal {{as|{{rd|140% '''base''' AD|70% '''base''' AD}}|ad}} {{as|(+ {{fd|3.5}}% '''maximum''' health)}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}, increased to {{as|{{rd|400% '''base''' AD|200% '''base''' AD}}|ad}} {{as|(+ 7% '''maximum''' health)}} for structures.

passives.name: Boarding Party
passives.effects: Allied {{ui|Blue Siege Minion|link=Siege minion|siege minions}} and {{ui|Blue Super Minion|link=Super minion|super minions}} within {{tip|er|icononly=true}} {{tt|1050|Estimated}} units gain {{rd|20 to 135|10 to 68.5|pp=true}} {{as|'''bonus''' armor}} and {{as|'''bonus''' magic resistance}}, as well as 10% increased size.

name: Guardian's Hammer
simpleDescription: Good starting item for attackers

passives.name: Legendary
passives.effects: This item counts as a Legendary item.

name: Gargoyle Stoneplate
simpleDescription: Greatly increases defense near multiple enemies.

active.name: Unbreakable
active.effects: Gain a {{tip|shield}} for 300 {{as|(+ 100% '''bonus''' health)}} that decays over 5 seconds, and 25% increased [[size]] while the shield holds.

name: Farsight Alteration
simpleDescription: Grants increased range and reveals the targetted area

active.name: Trinket
active.effects: Places a visible {{tip|Farsight Ward}} at the target location that grants {{tip|sight}} of the surrounding area, including over [[terrain]] and through [[brush]] and lasting indefinitely. Also grants sight of the area in a 800 radius for 2 seconds. Upon detecting an enemy champion, the ward will increase its sight radius to 800 units and destroy itself after 3 seconds.

name: Ardent Censer
simpleDescription: Shield and heal effects on other units grant both of you Attack Speed and their attacks deal additional on-hit magic damage.

passives.name: Sanctify
passives.effects: {{tip|Heal|Healing}} or {{tip|shield|shielding}} allied champions (''excluding yourself'') enhances you and them for 6 seconds, granting {{as|25% '''bonus''' attack speed|attack speed}} and {{as|20 '''bonus''' magic damage}} [[on-hit]] on basic attacks.

passives.name: Spellblade
passives.effects: After using an [[champion ability|ability]], your next basic attack [[on-hit]] within 10 seconds deals {{as|140% '''base''' AD (+ 20% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} and restores {{as|mana}} equal to{{ft|40% of that amount|{{as|56% '''base''' AD (+ 8% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}.

name: Eye of the Herald
simpleDescription: Eye of the Herald - a Gift of the Void.

name: Black Spear
simpleDescription: Kalista's spear that binds an Oathsworn Ally.

active.name: Oathsworn Bond
active.effects: After a {{fd|3.5}}-second [[Channel#Casting Times|cast time]] and a 3-second {{tip|channel}} afterwards from the user and the target allied champion, both become bound allies. The target is unable to act for 6 seconds after the channel's duration. Afterwards, the target becomes an ''Oathsworn''.

name: Dead Man's Plate
simpleDescription: Build momentum as you move around then smash into enemies.

passives.name: Shipwrecker
passives.effects: While moving, generates 7 stacks of ''Momentum'' every {{fd|0.25}} seconds, granting up to {{as|40 '''bonus''' movement speed}} at 100 stacks after {{fd|3.75}} seconds of moving. Basic attacks consume all stacks to deal {{as|{{pp|0 to 40 for 11|0 to 100|type=Momentum|label1=stacks of Momentum|formula=0.4 for every 1 stack of Momentum, capped at 40}}|physical damage}} {{as|(+ {{pp|0 to 100 for 11|0 to 100|key=%|type=Momentum|label1=stacks of Momentum|formula=1% for every 1 stack of Momentum, capped at 100}} '''base''' AD)}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} [[on-hit]].

passives.name: Unsinkable
passives.effects: Gain 25% {{tip|slow resist}}.

name: Crystalline Bracer
simpleDescription: Grants Health and Health Regen

passives.name: Eternity
passives.effects: Restore {{as|mana}} equal to 7% of {{tt|pre-mitigation damage|Damage calculated before modifiers}} taken from champions, and {{tip|heal}} for an amount equal to {{as|25% of mana spent}}, up to 20 per cast. Toggled abilities can only heal for up to 20 per second.

name: Edge of Night
simpleDescription: Periodically blocks enemy abilities

passives.name: Annul
passives.effects: Grants a {{tip|spell shield}} that blocks the next hostile ability.

passives.name: Upgrade
passives.effects: You have completed the support quest and can now upgrade this item, '''Bounty of Worlds''', for free into ''{{ii|Bloodsong}}'', ''{{ii|Celestial Opposition}}'', ''{{ii|Dream Maker}}'', ''{{ii|Solstice Sleigh}}'', or ''{{ii|Zaz'Zak's Realmspike}}'' by selecting one of them from a custom menu in the HUD or the shop. ''The upgrade can be done outside the shop using the menu.''
Receives diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.

active.name: Ward
active.effects: Consumes a charge to place a {{tip|Stealth Ward}} at the target location, which grants {{tip|sight}} of the surrounding area. Charges refill upon visiting the shop.

passives.name: Blessing of the Mountain
passives.effects: Become ''Blessed'' to reduce incoming champion damage by {{rd|35%|25%}}, lingering for 2 seconds after taking damage from a champion. After the linger ends, you lose ''Blessed'' to unleash a shockwave around you that {{tip|slow|slows}} nearby enemies by 60% for 2 seconds.
Receives diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.

active.name: Ward
active.effects: Consumes a charge to place a {{tip|Stealth Ward}} at the target location, which grants {{tip|sight}} of the surrounding area. Charges refill upon visiting the shop.

passives.name: Dream Maker
passives.effects: Every 8 seconds, you gain a ''Blue Dream Bubble'' and a ''Purple Dream Bubble''. Granting a {{tip|heal}} or {{tip|shield}} to an allied champion ''(excluding yourself)'' causes you to blow both of your ''Dream Bubbles'' to them, empowering them for 3 seconds. The ''Blue Bubble'' reduces the next instance of non-{{tip|minion}} damage they take by {{pp|75 to 255 for 13|1;7 to 18|type=your level}} and the ''Purple Bubble'' grants them {{as|{{pp|50 to 170 for 13|1;7 to 18|type=your level}} '''bonus''' magic damage}} [[on-hit]] on their next basic attack.
Receives diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.

active.name: Ward
active.effects: Consumes a charge to place a {{tip|Stealth Ward}} at the target location, which grants {{tip|sight}} of the surrounding area. Charges refill upon visiting the shop.

passives.name: Spellblade
passives.effects: After using an ability, your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals {{as|100% '''base''' AD}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} [[on-hit]]. If the target is a champion, inflict them with ''Expose Weakness'' for 6 seconds, causing them to take {{rd|10%|5%}} increased damage from all sources.
Receives diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.

active.name: Ward
active.effects: Consumes a charge to place a {{tip|Stealth Ward}} at the target location, which grants {{tip|sight}} of the surrounding area. Charges refill upon visiting the shop.

name: Fire at Will
simpleDescription: Cannon Barrage fires at an increasing rate over time (additional 6 waves over the duration).

passives.name: Fire at Will
passives.effects: {{ai|Cannon Barrage|Gangplank}} fires 2 additional clusters of 3 waves over the duration at an increased rate of fire (1 cluster per {{fd|1.33}} seconds), for a total of 18 waves over the 8 seconds.

name: Death's Daughter
simpleDescription: <mainText>Cannon Barrage additionally fires a mega-cannonball at the center of the Barrage, dealing <trueDamage>bonus true damage</trueDamage> and <status>Slowing</status>.</mainText>

passives.name: Death's Daughter
passives.effects: A massive cannonball lands after {{ais|Cannon Barrage|Gangplank}} first cluster of waves, dealing {{sti|true damage|{{as|{{ap|120 to 300 3}}|true damage}}}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}} {{as|true damage}} to enemies struck and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 75% for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.

name: Imperial Mandate
simpleDescription: Defer damage until later.

passives.name: Coordinated Fire
passives.effects: Abilities that {{tip|slow}} or {{tip|immobilize}} enemy champions mark them for 5 seconds. Allied champions that damage marked enemies consume the mark to deal {{as|10% of the target's '''current''' health}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} and grant you and the triggering ally {{as|25% '''bonus''' movement speed}} for 2 seconds.

name: Bloodletter's Curse
simpleDescription: Grant Spell Shield after damaging an enemy with an ability

passives.name: Vile Decay
passives.effects: Dealing {{as|magic damage}} to an enemy champion applies a stack to them for 6 seconds, stacking up to 6 times. Each stack inflicts {{as|5% magic resistance reduction}}, up to {{as|30%|mr}} at 6 stacks. Damaging basic attacks and spells can only apply a stack once every 2 seconds.

passives.name: Char
passives.effects: Basic attacks [[on-hit]] and [[champion ability|ability]] hits against enemies {{tip|heal}} you for {{as|2% of target's '''current''' health}} and apply a burn that deals {{as|4|physical damage}} {{as|(+ 12% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 10% AP)}} {{as|(+ 2% of target's '''missing''' health)}} {{as|physical damage}} every second over 4 seconds.

name: Force of Nature
simpleDescription: Move Speed, Magic Resist, and max Health Regeneration

passives.name: Steadfast
passives.effects: Taking {{as|magic damage}} from champions grants a stack of ''Steadfast'' for 7 seconds, stacking up to 8 times with the duration refreshing on subsequent {{as|magic damage}} from them and whenever dealing damage to them. Becoming {{tip|immobilize|immobilized}} by an enemy champion grants 2 stacks and also refreshes the duration. Damaging basic attacks and spells per {{tip|cast instance}} can only grant 1 stack of ''Steadfast'' every 1 second. At '''maximum''' stacks, gain {{as|70 '''bonus''' magic resistance}} and {{as|10% '''bonus''' movement speed}}.

name: Horizon Focus
simpleDescription: Immobilizing a champion causes lightning to strike them

passives.name: Hypershot
passives.effects: Dealing [[Ability_effects#Triggering_from_champion_ability_damage|ability damage]] to a champion at {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} 600 or more units away from the cast position {{tip|standard sight|reveals}} them and increases your damage dealt to them by 10% for 6 seconds.

passives.name: Focus
passives.effects: Upon triggering ''Hypershot'', grant {{tip|sight}} of the {{tt|area|Grants sight through terrain and brush}} {{tip|cr|icononly=true}} 1400 units around the target and apply ''Hypershot's'' effects to enemy champions within the area for 3 seconds.

name: Cosmic Drive
simpleDescription: Massive amounts of Cooldown Reduction

passives.name: Spelldance
passives.effects: Dealing [[ability damage]] to an enemy champion grants you {{as|{{pp|25 to 60}} '''bonus''' movement speed|ms}} for 2 seconds.

passives.name: Sinister Pact
passives.effects: Increase your {{as|ability power}} by {{as|4%|ap}} for every {{as|300 '''current''' health}} you are missing, up to a {{as|40%|ap}} increase at {{as|3000 '''current''' health}} missing.

active.name: Price of Power
active.effects: Pay a {{tip|health resource|health cost}} of {{as|300 '''current''' health}} to gain {{as|100% '''bonus''' movement speed}} decaying over 2 seconds. This effect '''cannot''' reduce the user below {{as|1 health}}.

passives.name: Safeguard
passives.effects: Become ''Safeguarded'' to reduce incoming champion damage by 40%, lingering for 3 seconds after taking damage from a champion.

passives.name: Watch Them Fall
passives.effects: {{tip|Immobilize|Immobilizing}} an enemy champion summons a comet above them that lands at their current location after 1 second, dealing {{as|{{pp|50 to 150}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}} {{as|(+ 5% of your '''maximum''' health)}} {{as|magic damage}} to enemies within the area.

passives.name: Ignore Pain
passives.effects: Reduces {{rd|30%|10%}} of all {{tt|post-mitigation|Damage calculated after modifiers}} {{as|physical|physical damage}} and {{as|magic|magic damage}} damage received and instead stores the damage to successively take it as {{as|true damage}} over 3 seconds, dealing a third of the stored damage each second.

passives.name: Defy
passives.effects: If an enemy champion dies within 3 seconds of you damaging them, removes ''Ignore Pain's'' remaining stored damage and {{tip|heals}} you for {{as|75% '''bonus''' AD}} over 2 seconds.

passives.name: Hackshorn
passives.effects: Dealing {{as|physical damage}} to enemy champions inflicts them with {{tip|Grievous Wounds}} for 3 seconds.

name: Echoes of Helia
simpleDescription: Damage low-health enemies to trigger a cursed explosion, dealing damage and slowing nearby foes

passives.name: Soul Siphon
passives.effects: Damaging an enemy champion with a basic attack or [[ability damage]] grants a ''Soul Shard'', up to 3. {{tip|Heal|Healing}} or {{tip|shield|shielding}} an allied champion (''excluding yourself'') consumes all ''Soul Shards'' to heal them for 40 per shard and deal {{as|45 magic damage}} per shard to the nearest enemy champion within 1100 units of the ally.

passives.name: First Light
passives.effects: Gain {{as|3% heal and shield power|hsp}} and {{as|5 ability power}} for every additional {{as|100% '''base''' mana regeneration}}.

passives.name: Radiance
passives.effects: Gain 18 [[Haste#Summoner_spell_haste|summoner spell haste]].

passives.name: Spellblade
passives.effects: After using an [[champion ability|ability]], your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals {{as|160% '''base''' AD}} {{as|(+ {{rd|4%|2%}} of target's '''maximum''' health)}} as {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} [[on-hit]], for a '''minimum''' of {{as|160% '''base''' AD}}. If the target is a champion, {{tip|heal}} for {{as|88% '''base''' AD}} {{as|(+ {{rd|{{fd|2.2}}%|{{fd|1.1}}%}} of target's '''maximum''' health)|health}}.

active.name: Glaciate
active.effects: Unleash a fan of icy shards in a cone in the target direction, dealing {{as|100|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 50% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}} {{as|magic damage}} to enemies struck within and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 65% for {{fd|1.5}} seconds. Enemies hit in the center of the cone are {{tip|root|rooted}} for the same duration instead.

passives.name: Immolate
passives.effects: Taking or dealing damage activates this passive for 3 seconds. Deal {{as|13 {{as|(+ {{fd|0.5}}% '''bonus''' health)}} magic damage|magic damage}} every second to enemies within {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} 325 (+ 100% '''bonus''' [[size]]) units, with the damage being increased by 25% against minions and monsters. This executes minions that would be killed by one more tick of damage.

name: Iceborn Gauntlet
simpleDescription: High Magic Resist.Passively slow nearby enemies. When spells are cast near you, release a wave of energy that damages and slows.

passives.name: Spellblade
passives.effects: After using an [[champion ability|ability]], your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals {{as|100% '''base''' AD}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} [[on-hit]] and creates a 300 radius frost field for 2 seconds. Enemies within the field are slowed by {{rd|15%|{{fd|7.5}}%}} {{as|(+ {{rd|{{fd|0.4}}%|{{fd|0.2}}%}} per 100 '''maximum''' health)}}.

name: Hollow Radiance
simpleDescription: Immobilize enemies to gain a shield. Activate to run faster at opponents.

passives.name: Immolate
passives.effects: Taking or dealing damage activates this passive for 3 seconds. Deal {{as|10 {{as|(+ {{fd|1.75}}% '''bonus''' health)}} magic damage|magic damage}} every second to enemies within {{tip|cr|icononly=true}} 325 (+ 100% '''bonus''' size) units, with the damage being increased by 25% against minions. This executes minions that would be killed by one more tick of damage.

passives.name: Desolate
passives.effects: Killing an {{tt|enemy unit|Excluding wards and structures.}} deals {{as|20 {{as|(+ {{fd|3.5}}% '''bonus''' health)}} magic damage|magic damage}} to enemies near them.

passives.name: Voidborn Resilience
passives.effects: Gain a stack for each second [[Combat status|in combat]] with enemy champions, stacking up to 5 times. At '''maximum''' stacks, increase your {{as|'''bonus''' armor}} and {{as|'''bonus''' magic resistance}} by 30% until the end of combat.

active.name: Cloudburst
active.effects: {{tip|Dash}} to the target location and fire three homing missiles at the {{tt|most wounded|Lowest health percent}} enemy within {{tip|cr|icononly=true}} 750 units of you at the end of the dash, prioritizing enemy champions. Each missile deals {{as|{{pp|150/3 to 350/3|1;8 to 18 by 1}} {{as|(+ 20% '''bonus''' AD)}} physical damage|physical damage}}, for a total of {{as|{{pp|150 to 350|1;8 to 18 by 1}} {{as|(+ 60% '''bonus''' AD)}}|physical damage}}, increased by {{pp|type= target's '''missing''' health|color=health|key=%|0 to 50|key1=%|0 to 75 for 11|formula=5% per 7.5% of enemies' '''missing''' health}}.

passives.name: Lifeline
passives.effects: If you would take damage that would reduce you below {{as|30% of your '''maximum''' health}}, you first gain a {{tip|shield}} that absorbs {{pp|320 to 530|1;12;13;14;15;16;17;18|formula=320 + 30 per level starting at level 12}} damage for 3 seconds.

passives.name: Nightstalker
passives.effects: Your abilities deal {{as|{{rd|{{pp|0 to 25 for 11|0 to 70|key=%|key1=%|type=target's '''missing''' health|showtype=false}}|{{pp|0 to 15 for 11|0 to 70|key=%|key1=%|type=target's '''missing''' health|showtype=false}}}}|hp}} {{as|(based on target's '''missing''' health)}} increased damage against enemy champions. Scoring a {{tip|takedown}} against an enemy champion within 3 seconds of damaging them renders you {{tip|untargetable}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds, which ends prematurely if you perform an action that {{tip|break stealth|breaks stealth}}.

passives.name: Ever Rising Moon
passives.effects: Damaging [[basic attack]]s, [[champion ability|abilities]], [[Named item effect|item effects]], and [[summoner spell]]s, as well as the application of {{tip|crowd control}} and [[damage over time]] effects, generate [[stack]]s against enemy champions, up to one per attack or cast per champion. Applying 2 stacks to a champion within a 2 second period deals {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} to them equal to {{as|{{rd|6%|4%}} of target's '''maximum''' health}} and grants you a {{tip|shield}} for {{rd|160|80}} {{as|(+ {{rd|40%|{{fd|20}}%}} '''bonus''' AD)}} for 2 seconds.

passives.name: Flux
passives.effects: Scoring a {{tip|takedown}} against an enemy champion within 3 seconds of damaging them refunds 10% {{as|(+ {{fd|0.3}}% per 1 Lethality)}} of your ultimate ability's '''total''' cooldown.

passives.name: Eminence
passives.effects: Scoring a {{tip|takedown}} against an enemy champion within 3 seconds of damaging them generates a permanent stack and grants you {{as|15|ad}} (+ 2 per stack) {{as|'''bonus''' attack damage}} for 90 seconds.

passives.name: Scorn
passives.effects: Gain 20 [[Haste#Ultimate haste|ultimate haste]].

passives.name: Hatefog
passives.effects: Dealing [[ability damage]] to enemy champions with your [[champion ability|ultimate ability]] creates a {{pp|type=ultimate's damage instance|251;251.8;253.1;255.5;259.8;267.3;280.7;304.2;345.9;419.7;550|0 to 823|formula=250 + 2^(damage dealt/100)}} radius scorched zone beneath them for 3 seconds, applying a ''Curse'' to enemies within that deals {{ft|{{as|{{ap|60/4}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ {{ap|5/4}}% AP)}} {{as|magic damage}} every {{fd|0.25}} seconds|{{as|{{ap|60*3}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ {{ap|5*3}}% AP)}} {{as|'''total''' magic damage}} over the duration}} and reduces their {{as|magic resistance by 10}}.

passives.name: Spellblade
passives.effects: After using an [[champion ability|ability]], your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals {{as|100% '''base''' AD}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} [[on-hit]] and creates a 300 radius frost field for 2 seconds. Enemies within the field are slowed by {{rd|15%|{{fd|7.5}}%}} {{as|(+ {{rd|{{fd|0.4}}%|{{fd|0.2}}%}} per 100 '''maximum''' health)}}.

passives.name: Eminence
passives.effects: Scoring a {{tip|takedown}} against an enemy champion within 3 seconds of damaging them generates a permanent stack and grants you {{as|15|ad}} (+ 2 per stack) {{as|'''bonus''' attack damage}} for 90 seconds.

passives.name: Void Corruption
passives.effects: For each second [[combat status|in combat]] with champions, deal 2% increased damage, stacking up to 5 times for a total of 10%. At maximum stacks, gain {{as|{{rd|10%|6%}} omnivamp}}.

passives.name: Void Infusion
passives.effects: Gain {{as|ability power}} equal to {{as|2% '''bonus''' health}}.

passives.name: Load
passives.effects: Gain a ''Shot Charge'' stack every 3 seconds, up to a maximum of 6.

passives.name: Fire
passives.effects: Dealing [[ability damage]] to an enemy consumes all ''Shot Charges'' to deal {{as|45|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 4% AP)}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} to them and, for each charge consumed beyond the first, an additional enemy within {{tip|cr|icononly=true}} 600 units of them, firing an orb at each secondary target that impacts after {{rutngt|0.5}} to deal the damage. If the number of additional targets fired at is less than the number of charges consumed,{{ft|deal an additional {{as|{{pp|45*0.35 to 45*5*0.35 for 5|1 to 5|changedisplay=true|type=remaining ''Shot Charges''}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ {{pp|key=%|4*0.35 to 4*5*0.35 for 5|1 to 5|type=remaining ''Shot Charges''|changedisplay=true|showtype=false}} AP)}} {{as|magic damage}} to the primary target, for a total of {{as|{{pp|(45*0.35)+45 to (45*5*0.35)+45 for 5|1 to 5|type=remaining ''Shot Charges''|changedisplay=true|showtype=false}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ {{pp|key=%|(4*0.35)+4 to (4*5*0.35)+4 for 5|1 to 5|type=remaining ''Shot Charges''|changedisplay=true|showtype=false}} AP)}}.|deal an additional 35% damage to the primary target for each remaining charge.}}

passives.name: Cleave
passives.effects: Basic attacks [[on-hit]] deal {{rd|{{as|40% AD}}|{{as|20% AD}}}} {{as|physical damage}} to other enemies in a {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} 350 radius centered around the target.

passives.name: Temper
passives.effects: Dealing {{as|physical damage}} grants you {{as|20 '''bonus''' movement speed}} for 2 seconds.

active.name: Breaking Shockwave
active.effects: Deal {{as|80% AD}} {{as|physical damage}} to enemies in a {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} 450 radius centered around you and {{tip|slow}} them by 35% for 3 seconds. For each champion hit, gain {{as|35% '''bonus''' movement speed}} decaying over 3 seconds. Can move while casting.

passives.name: Spellblade
passives.effects: After using an [[Champion ability|ability]], your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals {{as|200% '''base''' AD}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} [[on-hit]].

passives.name: Quicken
passives.effects: Basic attacks [[on-hit]] grant {{as|20 '''bonus''' movement speed}} for 2 seconds

passives.name: Preparation
passives.effects: After being [[Combat status|out-of-combat]] with enemy champions for 8 seconds, gain {{as|{{pp|5;5.5 to 10 for 10|1;8 to 17|formula=5 + 0.5 starting at level 8 and until level 17}} lethality}}. This bonus remains for 3 seconds after dealing damage to an enemy champion.

passives.name: Extraction
passives.effects: Scoring a {{tip|takedown}} against an enemy champion within 3 seconds of damaging them grants you {{as|150 '''bonus''' movement speed}} that decays over {{fd|1.5}} seconds.

passives.name: Timeless
passives.effects: This item gains {{as|20 '''bonus''' health}}, {{as|20 '''bonus''' mana}}, and {{as|4 ability power}} every minute, up to 10 times, for a maximum of {{as|200 '''bonus''' health}}, {{as|200 '''bonus''' mana}}, and {{as|40 ability power}}. Upon reaching maximum stacks, gain a level that preserves your current experience (cap remains at level 18).

passives.name: Eternity
passives.effects: Restore {{as|mana}} equal to 7% of {{tt|pre-mitigation damage|Damage calculated before modifiers}} taken from champions, and {{tip|heal}} for an amount equal to {{as|25% of mana spent}}, up to 20 per cast. Toggled abilities can only heal for up to 20 per second.

passives.name: Soul Siphon
passives.effects: Damaging an enemy champion with a basic attack or [[ability damage]] grants a ''Soul Shard'', up to 3. {{tip|Heal|Healing}} or {{tip|shield|shielding}} an allied champion (''excluding yourself'') consumes all ''Soul Shards'' to heal them for 40 per shard and deal {{as|45 magic damage}} per shard to the nearest enemy champion within 1100 units of the ally.

passives.name: Anguish
passives.effects: Every 7 seconds in combat with champions, deal {{as|{{pp|30 to 50}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 3% '''bonus''' health)}} {{as|magic damage}} to enemy champions within 650 units and {{tip|heal}} yourself equal to 250% of the {{tt|post-mitigation damage|Damage calculated after modifiers}} dealt to all targets.

passives.name: Lightshield Strike
passives.effects: Your next basic attack against a champion is empowered to {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} for 175% damage and {{tip|heal}} you for {{as|140% '''base''' AD}} {{as|(+ 8% of your '''missing''' health)}}. Excess healing beyond {{as|'''maximum''' health}} is converted to {{as|'''bonus''' health}} for 6 seconds.

passives.name: Energized
passives.effects: Moving and basic attacking generates ''Energize'' stacks, up to 100.

passives.name: Bolt
passives.effects: When fully {{tip|Energized}}, your next basic attack deals {{as|100 '''bonus''' magic damage}} [[on-hit]] and grants you {{as|45% '''bonus''' movement speed}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.

passives.name: Vendetta
passives.effects: Take 1% reduced damage per stack of ''Vendetta'' from your ''Nemesis'', up to 30% damage reduction against them.

passives.name: Vengeance
passives.effects: At '''maximum''' stacks, your ''Nemesis'' has 20% reduced {{tip|tenacity}} while they are within {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} 700 units of you.

active.name: Vow
active.effects: Curse the target enemy champion, designating them as your ''Nemesis'' and granting you 1 stack of ''Vendetta'' every 2 seconds over 60 seconds, stacking up to 30 times. These stacks are lost upon selecting a new ''Nemesis''. Cannot be cast for 15 seconds while in combat with enemy champions.

passives.name: Unmake
passives.effects: Enemy champions within {{tt|550 units|center to edge}} of you become cursed, reducing their {{as|magic resistance by 5}} {{as|(+ {{fd|1.2}}% '''bonus''' health)}}, capped at a reduction of {{as|25|magic resistance}}. Gain {{as|9 '''bonus''' magic resistance}} per cursed enemy.
